attributes.action: Allow Ocular Melanoma sufferers in Scotland to receive abdominal MRI Scans
attributes.additional_details: Ocumeluk is the one and only charity for Ocular Melanoma sufferers and they also believe MRI scans are vital.
attributes.background: I suffer from Ocular Melanoma and am at risk of metastasis to my liver. NHS Scotland refuse to provide enhanced abdominal MRI scans they only give abdominal ultrasound which does not detect spread soon.  There is no treatment for liver cancer but if found quickly life prolonging drugs can be given.

rejection.details:
Healthcare is a matter devolved to the Scottish Parliament, and is therefore not the responsibility of the UK Government or Parliament. You could start a new petition about this issue with the Scottish Government using the link below:

https://www.parliament.scot/gettinginvolved/petitions/
